name: Retro Noir
description:
This is a game about being e detective, finding clues left behind and searching for dangerous criminals. are you up to the task, detective?

Controls:

  • arrow keys/wasd to move
  • Z to interact with things
  • Enter to select dialogs
  • B to arrest your suspect
  • M to open map

Main Team:

- Bellacomeli - QA

- Norbert Weiher - Sound

- Rafael Sewa - Art

- Rezzycavalheiro - Programming

- Yerik (yrk06) - Programming

FMOD:

Godot FMOD Integration:

Fonts:

Dogica Font
